mapper.select: SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, W.* FROM ((SELECT WM_NO AS wmNo, WM_LEADER AS wmLeader, WM_TITLE AS wmTitle, WM_SUB_TITLE AS wmSubTitle, WM_TAG AS wmTag, WM_MEET_TIME AS wmMeetTime, WM_ADDR AS wmAddr, WM_RANGE_MEMBER AS wmRangeMember, WM_CONTENT AS wmContent, REPLY AS reply, WM_DATE AS wmDate FROM walk_mate_tbl ORDER BY WM_NO DESC)W)

SELECT A.WM_APPLY_NO AS wmApplyNo, A.WM_NO AS wmNo, A.MEMBER_ID AS memberId, A.APPLY_CONTENT AS applyContent, A.APPLY_STAT AS applyStat, B.MEMBER_NICKNAME AS memberNickname, B.MEMBER_PHOTO AS memberPhoto, B.MEMBER_INTRO AS memberIntro FROM (SELECT * FROM WM_APPLY_TBL)A LEFT JOIN MEMBER_TBL B ON A.MEMBER_ID = B.MEMBER_ID where wm_No=#{_parameter}
SELECT FILE_NO AS fileNo, WM_NO AS wmNo, FILENAME AS filename, FILEPATH AS filepath FROM WM_FILE_TBL WHERE WM_NO=#{_parameter}

SELECT A.*, B.MEMBER_NICKNAME AS leaderNickname FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, W.* FROM ((SELECT WM_NO AS wmNo, WM_LEADER AS wmLeader, WM_TITLE AS wmTitle, WM_SUB_TITLE AS wmSubTitle, WM_TAG AS wmTag, WM_MEET_TIME AS wmMeetTime, WM_ADDR AS wmAddr, WM_RANGE_MEMBER AS wmRangeMember, WM_CONTENT AS wmContent, REPLY AS reply, WM_DATE AS wmDate FROM walk_mate_tbl ORDER BY WM_NO DESC)W))A LEFT JOIN MEMBER_TBL B ON A.wmLeader = B.MEMBER_NO WHERE A.wmNo =#{_parameter}

SELECT A.WM_APPLY_NO AS wmApplyNo, A.WM_NO AS wmNo, A.MEMBER_ID AS memberId, A.APPLY_CONTENT AS applyContent, A.APPLY_STAT AS applyStat, B.MEMBER_NICKNAME AS memberNickname, B.MEMBER_PHOTO AS memberPhoto, B.MEMBER_INTRO AS memberIntro FROM (SELECT * FROM WM_APPLY_TBL)A LEFT JOIN MEMBER_TBL B ON A.MEMBER_ID = B.MEMBER_ID where wm_No=#{_parameter}
SELECT FILE_NO AS fileNo, WM_NO AS wmNo, FILENAME AS filename, FILEPATH AS filepath FROM WM_FILE_TBL WHERE WM_NO=#{_parameter}

SELECT A.WMC_NO AS wmcNo, A.WM_NO AS wmNo, A.WMC_GROUP AS wmcGroup, A.WMC_GROUP_ORDER AS wmcGroupOrder, A.WMC_CLASS AS wmcClass, A.MEMBER_NO AS memberNo, A.WMC_CONTENT AS wmcContent, A.WMC_DATE AS wmcDate, B.MEMBER_NICKNAME AS memberNickname, B.MEMBER_PHOTO AS memberPhoto FROM (SELECT * FROM WMC_TBL WHERE WM_NO =#{_parameter}) A LEFT JOIN MEMBER_TBL B ON A.MEMBER_NO = B.MEMBER_NO ORDER BY A.WMC_GROUP ASC, A.WMC_GROUP_ORDER ASC

INSERT INTO WMC_TBL VALUES( WMC_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{wmNo}, WMC_GROUP_SEQ.NEXTVAL, 0, 0, #{memberNo}, #{wmcContent}, to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:MI') )
INSERT INTO WMC_TBL VALUES( WMC_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{wmNo}, #{wmcGroup}, #{wmcGroupOrder}, 1, #{memberNo}, #{wmcContent}, to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:MI') )
